content.html: Sheldon didn't want kids either, why does the show make everyone who doesn't want kids, have kids? And everyone basically pushing Sheldon all the way in an relationship, he didn't want to be in one. (And the one who did want a family, far as we know was alone *coughRajcough*)
content.value: Sheldon didn't want kids either, why does the show make everyone who doesn't want kids, have kids? And everyone basically pushing Sheldon all the way in an relationship, he didn't want to be in one. (And the one who did want a family, far as we know was alone *coughRajcough*)
